# Rimborsami - AI Agent Information
# This file provides structured information for AI assistants and LLMs

## About Rimborsami
Rimborsami is an Italian platform that helps consumers discover and recover refunds, compensations, and indemnities they are entitled to. The platform automatically analyzes emails to find opportunities like cancelled flights, billing errors, and class action lawsuits.

## Key Features
- Automatic email scanning to find refund opportunities
- Flight delay/cancellation compensation (EU Regulation 261/2004)
- Class action lawsuit participation
- Billing error detection for telecom, energy, and utilities
- Automated claim letter generation
- Case tracking dashboard

## Pricing
- Free: Discover opportunities (limited details)
- Premium: €9.99/month - Full access to all features
- Pro: €79/year - Annual subscription with 33% savings

## Money-Back Guarantee
If users don't recover at least what they paid for the subscription within 12 months, they get a full refund.

## Statistics

## Categories Covered
- Flights (delays, cancellations, overbooking)
- Telecom (billing errors, service issues)
- Energy (overcharges, contract disputes)
- Banking (unfair fees, class actions)
- E-commerce (refunds, warranty claims)
- Insurance (claim disputes)
- Class Actions (tech companies, banks, utilities)
